description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Wiloke WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit.This issue affects WooCommerce Coupon Popup, SmartBar, Slide In | MyShopKit: from n/a through 1.0.9.
